description.DELETE_ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove the organization and its associated data.
description.SYNCHRONIZE_MILESTONE_DESCRIPTION: Synchronize milestone information and its issues directly from the provider.

description.TASKS: Track the history and progress of your past and ongoing tasks.
description.CREDENTIALS: Manage registered credentials or create new ones for your projects.
description.ORGANIZATIONS: Manage your organizations or create new ones for your projects.

errors.THERE_IS_NO_AVAILABLE_SCOPE_TYPES: No available scopes found to display.
errors.THERE_IS_NO_AVAILABLE_TARGETS_TO_SHOW: No projects or groups found to display.

feedbacks.SELECT_TYPE_FIRST_TO_LIST_CREDENTIALS: Select a provider type to display available credentials.
feedbacks.SELECT_TYPE_FIRST_TO_LIST_SCOPES: Select a provider type to display available scopes.
feedbacks.SELECT_TYPE_FIRST_TO_LIST_TARGETS: Select a provider type to display available targets.

messages.CREATE_CREDENTIALS_MESSAGE_SUCCESS: Attention, user! Your credential registration request was successfully submitted. You can track its progress in the Tasks menu.
messages.CREATE_CREDENTIALS_MESSAGE_ERROR: Attention, user! An error occurred while submitting your credential registration request. You can check details in the Tasks menu.
messages.CREATE_ORGANIZATION_MESSAGE_SUCCESS: Attention, user! Your request to create an organization was successfully submitted. You can track its progress in the Tasks menu.
messages.CREATE_ORGANIZATION_MESSAGE_ERROR: Attention, user! An error occurred while submitting your request to create an organization. You can check details in the Tasks menu.
messages.SYNCHRONIZE_MILESTONE_MESSAGE_SUCCESS: Attention, user! Your milestone synchronization request was successfully submitted. You can track its progress in the Tasks menu.
messages.SYNCHRONIZE_MILESTONE_MESSAGE_ERROR: Attention, user! An error occurred while submitting your milestone synchronization request. You can check details in the Tasks menu.
